metadata.title: CVE-2020-28724 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Open redirect vulnerability in werkzeug before 0.11.6 via a double slash inthe URL.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-28724` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-werkzeug - 0.10.4+dfsg1-1ubuntu1.2
python3-werkzeug - 0.10.4+dfsg1-1ubuntu1.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: python-werkzeug package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.10.4+dfsg1-1ubuntu1.2').
